$comment: Expected IR output for string-formats.zod4.ts - Maps Zod 4 string format functions to CastrSchema IR

Uuidv4Schema.$comment: UUIDv4 is a subset of UUID, format remains 'uuid'

Uuidv7Schema.$comment: UUIDv7 is a subset of UUID, format remains 'uuid'

Cidrv4Schema.$comment: CIDR blocks have no standard OpenAPI format, may use pattern or custom format

Cidrv6Schema.$comment: CIDR blocks have no standard OpenAPI format, may use pattern or custom format

JwtSchema.$comment: JWT has no standard OpenAPI format, may use custom format 'jwt'

E164Schema.$comment: E.164 phone format has no standard OpenAPI format
